description.narrative: Governments and national stakeholders ensure the provision of improved, comprehensive and harmonized ECD and ECE policies and services to address developmental needs of young children and prepare them for school., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, children and adolescents, especially the most vulnerable, have increased access to equitable and inclusive quality education opportunities leading to development, improved learning outcomes and skills for life and work.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Governments and national stakeholders ensure the provision of improved, comprehensive and harmonized ECD and ECE policies and services to address developmental needs of young children and prepare them for school.

Nmero de NN que se benefician de programas de educacin temprana a travs de enfoques alternativos (tales como programas de visitas a los hogares, modelos acelerados de preparacin para la escuela, educacin parental, entre otros) con el apoyo de UNICEF.

Service Delivery - Early learning - Number of children benefiting from early childhood education through alternative approaches (such as home based provision of ECD, accelerated school readiness models, parent education, among others) with support from UNICEF
